sec.p: CLM data are publicly available at the National Energy Research Scientific Computing Center archive ( https://www.portal.nersc.gov/archive/home/c/cdkoven/www/clm45_permafrostsims/permafrostRCN_modeldata). AThaw data and calculated radiative forcing for CLM and AThaw fluxes presented in this study are available within the article’s supplementary information file (Supplementary Data 1). Radiocarbon data are provided in Supplementary Data 2. All other data that support the findings of this study are available from the corresponding author (K.M.W.A.) upon request.
